thread.title: Darius Rucker Cried When South Carolina Made The Final Four
thread.title_full: Darius Rucker Cried When South Carolina Made The Final Four

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Darius Rucker Cried When South Carolina Made The Final Four
text:
The South Carolina Gamecocks are on their way to their first Final Four in school history after beating the Florida Gators in the Elite Eight and no one was happier than Hootie and the Blowfish’s lead singer Darius Rucker who cried tears of joy after the game was over. 
Hootie tears of joy #marchmadness pic.twitter.com/JLVhb9OM2H 
— LizzLocker (@Lizzs_Lockeroom) March 26, 2017 
Darius Rucker tears of joy #Hootie pic.twitter.com/i5urFxwoh1 
— gifdsports (@gifdsports) March 26, 2017 

Let it out Hootie. Let it out.
